accuracy.description: The degree to which the provided solution matches the correct answer.

completeness.description: The extent to which the solution addresses all parts of the task.

logical_coherence.description: The consistency and logical flow of the reasoning presented in the solution.

adherence_to_constraints.description: How well the solution complies with the given constraints and game rules.

explanation_clarity.description: The clarity of explanations and justifications provided for the solution.

efficiency.description: The efficiency of the solution approach, considering the complexity and steps taken to arrive at the answer.
